text: Thomas Michael "Mad Mike" Hoare (17 March 1919 – 2 February 2020) was an Irish mercenary leader and adventurer. He was known for his military activities in Africa and tried to lead a coup d'état in the Seychelles. Hoare died on 2 February 2020, aged 100. ==References== Category:1919 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Irish military people Category:Centenarians Category:Mercenaries
title: Mad Mike Hoare
